verses.verse: In those <S%H3117>days<s%> was <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H2470>sick<s%> unto <S%H4191>death<s%>. And <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H559>him<s%>, and said unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, Set thy <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H6680>order<s%>; for thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%>, and not <S%H2421>live<s%>.
Then <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H7023>wall<s%>, and <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>,

and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2142>Remember<s%> <S%H3068>now<s%>, O Jehovah, I <S%H577>beseech<s%> <S%H1980>thee<s%>, how I have walked <S%H6440>before<s%> thee in <S%H571>truth<s%> and with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>. And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H1419>sore<s%>.
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H1980><s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%>, I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> thy <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H1832>tears<s%>: <S%H3254>behold<s%>, I will add unto thy <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.
And I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee and this <S%H5892>city<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>; and I will <S%H1598>defend<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%>.
And this shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> unto thee from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> that he hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>:

behold <S%H6738><s%>, I will cause the shadow on the <S%H4609>steps<s%>, which is gone <S%H3381>down<s%> on <S%H8121>the<s%> <S%H4609>dial<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> with the <S%H7725>sun<s%>, to return <S%H322>backward<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%>. So the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> on the dial <S%H4609>whereon<s%> it was gone <S%H3381>down<s%>.
The <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, when he had been <S%H2470>sick<s%>, and was <S%H2421>recovered<s%> of his <S%H2483>sickness<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, In the <S%H1824>noontide<s%> of my <S%H3117>days<s%> I shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>: I am <S%H6485>deprived<s%> of the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of my <S%H8141>years<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%>, I shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>, even <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>: I shall <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> no more with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2309>world<s%>.

My <S%H1755>dwelling<s%> is <S%H5265>removed<s%>, and is <S%H1540>carried<s%> away from me as a <S%H7473>shepherd<s%>'s <S%H168>tent<s%>: I have <S%H7088>rolled<s%> <S%H707>up<s%>, like a weaver, my <S%H2416>life<s%>; he will cut me <S%H1214>off<s%> from the <S%H1803>loom<s%>: From <S%H3117>day<s%> even to <S%H3915>night<s%> wilt thou make an end of <S%H7999>me<s%>.

I <S%H7737>quieted<s%> myself until <S%H1242>morning<s%>; as a <S%H738>lion<s%>, so he <S%H7665>breaketh<s%> all my <S%H6106>bones<s%>: From <S%H3117>day<s%> even to <S%H3915>night<s%> wilt thou make an end of <S%H7999>me<s%>.

Like a <S%H5693>swallow<s%> or a <S%H5483>crane<s%>, so did I <S%H6850>chatter<s%>; I did <S%H1897>moan<s%> as a <S%H3123>dove<s%>; mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1809>fail<s%> with looking <S%H4791>upward<s%>: O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I am <S%H6234>oppressed<s%>, be thou my <S%H6148>surety<s%>.

What shall I <S%H1696>say<s%>? he hath both <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto <S%H6213>me<s%>, and himself hath done <S%H1718>it<s%>: I shall go softly all my <S%H8141>years<s%> because of the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, by these things men <S%H2421>live<s%>; And wholly therein is the <S%H2416>life<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: Wherefore <S%H2492>recover<s%> thou <S%H2421>me<s%>, and make me to live.

Behold <S%H7965><s%>, it was for my peace that I had great <S%H4751>bitterness<s%>: But thou hast in <S%H2836>love<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul<s%> delivered it from the <S%H7845>pit<s%> of <S%H1097>corruption<s%>; For thou hast <S%H7993>cast<s%> all my <S%H2399>sins<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> thy <S%H1460>back<s%>.

For <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> cannot <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H4194>thee<s%>, death cannot <S%H1984>celebrate<s%> <S%H3381>thee<s%>: They that go down into the <S%H953>pit<s%> cannot <S%H7663>hope<s%> for thy <S%H571>truth<s%>.

The <S%H2416>living<s%>, the <S%H2416>living<s%>, he shall <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3117>thee<s%>, as I do this day: The <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> shall make <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H571>truth<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is ready to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5058>me<s%>: Therefore we will sing my songs with stringed <S%H5059>instruments<s%> All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of our <S%H2416>life<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Now <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>, Let them <S%H5375>take<s%> a <S%H1690>cake<s%> of <S%H8384>figs<s%>, and lay it for a <S%H4799>plaster<s%> upon the <S%H7822>boil<s%>, and he shall <S%H2421>recover<s%>.
Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> also had <S%H559>said<s%>, What is the <S%H226>sign<s%> that I shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>?
